question: Who is the author of ‘The Daughter from a Wishing Tree: Unusual Tales about Women in Mythology’?
explanation: Acclaimed author and Infosys Foundation chairman Sudha Murty has launched her much awaited book The Daughter from a Wishing Tree Unusual Tales about Women in Mythology. The book was launched at the Crossword book store in Mantri Mall recently in the presence of Biocon MD Kiran Mazumdar Shaw and her husband John Shaw. In mythology there is always talk about Sita and Draupadi.
